version_description:
-Ability to view and retrieve your W2
-Login Improvements
-Bugfixes

-Ability to approve time off from push notifications
-Supervisor Impressions Approvals
-Impressions Push Notifications
-General Notifications improvements
-Improved Documents Handling in Company Links
-Bugfixes

Touch ID now provides a secure and convenient way to login to the Paylocity app.

*Due to an oversight, the latest Paylocity application was released for a few days with Touch ID not activated. The issue has since been resolved and Touch ID is now available.
Bug Fixes

Paylocity Mobile has been updated with a modern interface, powered by an updated technology stack. Not only will it provide new styling and support for existing features, it will also include updated experiences for several features and an assortment of other user experience tweaks.

- The new checks experience now provides a current or YTD of your pay
- We added a punch map that indicates in real-time where your GPS is locating you
- An updated Time Off Balance list puts the Available balances front and center for users
- Updated Schedule and Timesheet agenda views
- Various minor UX updates
- Support for Memos

The app includes support for our existing feature set, including:
- Edit your personal info, search the company Directory, or view current and historical Pay info on-the-go.
- Punch in and out from anywhere in the field or from designated areas with geo-fencing support and historical map views.
- Submit, view, and approve Time Off requests with real-time push notifications.
- Stay current on Company News and announcements
- Recognize employee achievements with Impressions
- Review and approve Schedules and Timesheets
- Review and approve Time Cards
- Access Company Links and acknowledge documents
- Login using Touch ID for faster, easier access
- Approve time off without opening the app with Interactive Notifications

The new checks helper gives an intro to the checks screen and points out important info, including deductions, taxes, and benefits.

Bug fixes, including:
-Fixed an issue preventing a small number of users from logging in
-Current Check YTD toggle now resets each time
-Fixed some issues with loading the punch map
-Punch transfers work for companies with a single LL/Cost Center
-Time off tabs no longer shown on balance details
-Time off status tab shown correctly
Minor bug fixes, including an issue where schedules might not show weekends.
We're always listening to your feedback! This release includes minor enhancements and we also squashed some bugs, including one where some time off requests were allowed incorrectly to go negative.

Thanks for using Paylocity! This update includes:

- Access the mobile receipt gallery to see and interact with uploaded receipts
- View your check on a single screen, along with hours and rate info
- Punch users with timesheet access get a read-only timesheet view of their hours
- Receive and click any notification to navigate to the related item in the app
- Minor enhancements and bug fixes

As always, we’re listening to your feedback. Send us your thoughts from More->Feedback!

Thanks for using Paylocity! You can now email your full check stub from your mobile device, complete with customizations. This update includes an adjustment to how time off balances are calculated in some situations, as well as a change to allow punches that have valid GPS coordinates when a device is not providing accuracy info. As always, we’re listening to your feedback. Please send us your thoughts using the “More->Feedback” section of the app!

This release fixes an issue that prevented some older iOS devices from logging in. As always, we’re listening to your feedback. Please send us your thoughts using the “More->Feedback” section of the app!

Thanks for using Paylocity! In this update, employees have a refreshed Schedule view, a filter to view "All activity" or "My shifts", and can view days in the past.

In addition, the Time Off Approvals Inbox now defaults to "Direct reports" and includes a filter for "All reports". We also fixed an issues that prevented time off from displaying correctly in the Inbox.

As always, we’re listening to your feedback. Send us your thoughts from More->Feedback!

In this version, we have added some exciting new features including Single Sign-on, Learning Management (LMS), Open Enrollment for Benefits, and full Multilingual support. Please note that these and some other features are only available to Paylocity customers that have chosen to purchase these features and enroll their employees.

We have also implemented various bug fixes and performance improvements.

In this version, we have added some exciting new features including Single Sign-on, Learning Management (LMS), Open Enrollment for Benefits, and full Multilingual support. Please note that these and some other features are only available to Paylocity customers that have chosen to purchase these features and enroll their employees.

We have also implemented various bug fixes and performance improvements.

In this version, we have added some exciting new features including Emergency Contacts in User Profile, Single Sign-on, Learning Management (LMS), Open Enrollment for Benefits, and full Multilingual support. Please note that these and some other features are only available to Paylocity customers that have chosen to purchase these features and enroll their employees.

We have also implemented various bug fixes and performance improvements.

In this version, we have added some exciting new features including Emergency Contacts in User Profile, Single Sign-on, Learning Management (LMS), Open Enrollment for Benefits, and full Multilingual support. Please note that these and some other features are only available to Paylocity customers that have chosen to purchase these features and enroll their employees.

We have also implemented various bug fixes and performance improvements.

In this version, our Learning Management system is expanded to include Independent Learning giving employees access to that company's Training Catalog to self-browse & self-assign training. Scheduling will now have additional availability options including recurrence & the ability to specify preferred availability in addition to unavailable work times. Please note that some features are only available to customers that have chosen to purchase these features.

We have also implemented bug fixes.

Users with access to the Expense feature can now capture round-trip mileage expenses on one single expense.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

Users with access to the Expense feature can now capture round-trip mileage expenses on one single expense.

Fixed an issue with our biometrics plugin and the application timing out. Biometric users with a session that timed out were given the appearance of biometrics being disabled. Update will resolve this issue and both Touch ID and Face ID will work as expected after a session times out.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

Fixed an issue with our biometrics plugin and the application timing out. Biometric users with a session that timed out were given the appearance of biometrics being disabled. Update will resolve this issue and both Touch ID and Face ID will work as expected after a session times out.

Issue with emailing checks is resolved.

Improved security settings which should result in less prompting for challenge questions.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

Landscape mode support added with this release. Improvements to our security settings, which should result in more accuracy for prompting challenge questions.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

Supervisors can use the Team Schedules option to view their employee schedules and shift details on their mobile device.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

Supervisors can use the Team Schedules option to view their employee schedules and shift details on their mobile device.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

You can now opt into our Stayed Logged In feature. This lets you pick up where you left off, without having to authorize via the login process. And to protect your data, sensitive areas have additional authorization required before access is granted, and re-authorization is required after a 90 day period.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

You can now opt into our Stayed Logged In feature. This lets you pick up where you left off, without having to authorize via the login process. And to protect your data, sensitive areas have additional authorization required before access is granted, and re-authorization is required after a 90 day period. Managers with the Scheduling feature can now customize their Team Schedule day view by adding filters. And Users with the Learning Management feature enabled (Learners) can now view training certificates under Completed Training.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

You can now opt into our Stayed Logged In feature. This lets you pick up where you left off, without having to authorize via the login process. And to protect your data, sensitive areas have additional authorization required before access is granted, and re-authorization is required after a 90 day period. Managers with the Scheduling feature can now customize their Team Schedule day view by adding filters. And Users with the Learning Management feature enabled (Learners) can now view training certificates under Completed Training.

Other bug fixes and performance improvements, as needed.

When enabled, managers can now quickly add, edit, delete, and reassign shifts from their Team Schedule
